Name: Pendergast
Review Text: A good place for an American BBQ meal. We ordered a sharing option that came with beef cheek, beef rib, pork rib plus sides of potato mash, Mac n cheese and salad. The meats were perfectly cooked and fall of the bone. The flavours were nice ‚Ä¶

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: A piece of ‚Äòthe south‚Äô in Amsterdam. Americans can do one thing like no other: barbecue. This is the first place in Amsterdam, or rather the Netherlands, that really understands the barbeque as it is intended, with all the taste buds that ‚Ä¶

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Decent food, good service. Don't expect any steaks and such because everything is smoked beforehand! The side dishes were really good. We had the brisket and pork cheeks which are probably the most popular dishes.

Name: Pendergast
Review Text:
Heavenly taste, first time having brisket and not the last one.
The Place is unique, deco super simple, but cozy, the staff is super friendly.
now I understand why needed to book almost a week in advance. üíõüíõ

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Ordered brisket and ribs. Both of them are great. Will definitely go again to try other main courses. Chocolate pecan cake was also so good. You won't regret

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: I went to Pendergast without realizing that I‚Äôve been there years ago. But once again, the food, the vibes, the service surprised me‚Ä¶ everything was so good, so smooth (from the main to side dishes, especially the mashed potatoes) Thank you for existing üòáüòáüòá

Name: Pendergast
Review Text:
Heerlijkkkk! Cant wait to go again!
The meat was so tender! More than perfect bite! Staffs are friendly and helpful!

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Fantastic brisket and ribs. Fried burnt ends are the must-have you didn‚Äôt know you needed. Lemon cake is amazing. ‚Ä¶

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Excellent pulled pork and ribs. The pulled pork has a strong bbq flavor. The brisket could be a bit more salty. ‚Ä¶

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: I‚Äôve eaten here before and it was amazing but I also just had it delivered and it was absolutely perfect. Really pleased with everything and packaged correctly and the food is so delicious.

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: I quite like this place! Been back three times since I discovered it a month ago. The food can be a tad inconsistent (sometimes too salty) but when it is good, which it usually is, it‚Äôs great. Highlights are the corn bread, brisket and Mac and cheese. Staff is wonderfully friendly too

Name: Pendergast
Review Text:
Great food, great beer selection, a must visit if you like authentic BBQ food.

We started with the deep fried brisket burnt ends, think "bitterballen" but made ‚Ä¶

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Great place for meat lovers, but you can find could salads too. Brisket was great, all the pork options amazing. We got to try all the side dishes. The beans with meat super. Corn bread tasty. Even the turkey was excellent. Only the mac and ‚Ä¶

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: The food and the drinks were delicious, if a little pricey. A style of food you won't find very easily in Amsterdam. ‚Ä¶

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Meat lover's paradise.  The brisket was excellent, and so were the ribs. Service was friendly and very good.  Highly recommended.  I have one request for the management:  please keep some American wines - and Sam Adams!

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: High quality and plenty quantity authentic comfort food in a cozy setting. The wine, cocktails also were a hit. The host is a very attentive and amiable person who will make you feel right at home. Definitely making a return visit as soon as possible highly recommended +++++

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: A small cozy establishment with very friendly people and awesome food. I had the brisket and it was delicious! I prefer this over any steak any day! It was super tender and full of flavor!

Name: Pendergast
Review Text:
KC bbq in Amsterdam!! I have only been once but will be back. They smoke the meats in house and all the sides are homemade as well.
We started with some delicious cocktails and the fried burnt ends. The burnt ‚Ä¶

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Amazing cocktails, delicious brisket.

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: We went with a couple of friends (3 in total). All of us are from Argentina, so we have good knowledge about meat and preparation methods. ‚Ä¶

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Lovely little place, quite hidden and unique in its own little way. Staff were very nice and food was amazing! Highly recommend

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Excellent vibe and food. The service is excellent and the personal is super friendly. ‚Ä¶

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Enjoyed my visit to Pendergast. It is a small restaurant so making a reservation is recommended. The staff is very friendly and helpful. Meat is of good quality, I would not recommend the salmon, compared to for example the brisket or ‚Ä¶

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Very nice staff, great food. Pork ribs was my favourite. Some dishes did need longer marinade for more flavour.

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: I'm generally not a fan of food in Amsterdam but Pendegast deserves its praise. It is all about meat here and the focus of the restaurant. But, vegetarians like me has a fab option in the seitan (even looks like meat) and many sides to choose from.

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Very special to have been here and taste the American way of food. Well done, new flavours and textures I have tasted. Don't be afraid of carbs, salt and fat. But ones in a while it is great.

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Cute little restaurant with one of the best BBQ meat I've ever eaten! The host was also very nice & attentive.

Name: Pendergast
Review Text:
Where do I begin..

Service was slow i.e had to ask for the menu üôÑ ‚Ä¶

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Glad to get a table, thanks for calling us from the waitlist. Food was awesome, both the ribs and the brisket, sides too! Can recommend!

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Beautiful little restaurant with amazing food. As a man from the south, I know my BBQ, and they do it very well here. Very satisfied with not only the food but the staff as well. Highly recommend!

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Holy COW! This was the best meat I‚Äôve eaten in all of Amsterdam. I can not recommend this epic bbq grill enough. Please go and eat to your hearts content! The sharing platter was more than enough - we ordered 2 sharing platters for 6 people total and it was incredible. I won‚Äôt have to eat for days now üòÇ

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Amazing bbq and sides.  The wine was great and the cocktails looked amazing. Really nice service as well.

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: I am not even sure I should post a review being afraid that once people discover this hidden gem I may never be able to find an available table :) Best meat place I have ever eaten in, period

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Wow! I very, very rarely eat meat but this was absolutely worth it. I had the fried burnt brisket ends and fried turkey as a starter and the brisket with a side of Mac and cheese as main and everything was divine. I'd been wanting to try ‚Ä¶

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Quality food and nice service! I particularly liked the De Max cocktail, perfect for summer. I also liked the fact that the restaurant is small and cozy although the acoustics are not the best (it was hard to have a conversation üòÖ)

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Delicious dinner at Pendergast last night. My favorites were the brisket, pork ribs, mashed potato and baked beans. They have a nice selection of craft beers as well. Looking forward to visiting again already.

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: As always, it was sublime: great food, cocktails with a twist, and a nice, cosy setting. Brandon and his crew never let you down.

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Omg don't book a seat here. Leave them all for me. This place is amazing. Beef ribs and brisket never disappoint.

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: One of the best meats in Amsterdam, pulled pork was sensational. Cocktails are really good as well, staff is very friendly but might take a while to serve you on busy evenings. ‚Ä¶

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: A simple small venue, with laser focus on smoked meats - and some alternatives available. If you appreciate butter-soft slow-cooked meat, give this a try. Old Pal is a great cocktail pairing with its bitter taste to contrast the charred meats.

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: This place is a must try with its delicious barbecue and tasty sides. The atmosphere is cute and the staff is very friendly.

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Was here with a group of colleagues for a team dinner (one of them gave a recommendation for the place). Now I can wholeheartedly recommend it as well - very nice slow cooked meat (I think it was a bit smoked as well). Good service, cozy atmosphere. Would love to visit again.

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: It‚Äôs a hidden gem (maybe not anymore after this review), among the best meat I tried in Amsterdam. Tiny restaurant with a cool interior.

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Legit. The only place that makes me feel like I‚Äôm at a classy, elevated BBQ joint in the south. Drink menu is excellent, food is the kind you do not want to eat every week (but only for health reasons). ‚Ä¶

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Lovely little American BBQ place with a nice atmosphere and some of the most tender brisket I've ever had. Can't wait to go again!

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Excellent food and service. The brisket is a must and the pork ribs are the best I've tried in Amsterdam. Important to mention the Butchers Tears tap beer, the perfect match for the BBQ. I will come back for sure.

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Very good Kansas style BBQ is this small joint. Super friendly staff and great food. Nice drink menu with lots of special liquors and good selection of craft beers.

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Great food and service. The plate didn't seem like a lot of food, but it turned out to be more than enough. The ribs were really juicy, it was perfect. The sides were a little disappointing.

Name: Pendergast
Review Text:
Simply put, the absolute best smoke house in Amsterdam. Hands down.

Only slightly negative points: small place, so don't go with 20 people; and the wines are not my favorite. The beers largely compensate, though!!

Name: Pendergast
Review Text:
Awesome food, great cocktails and good service!
The brisket and beef ribs were just perfect! One of the best places I've tried in Amsterdam. ‚Ä¶

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Pieces of meat that melt on your tongue, fresh coleslaw, pickled sour vegetables and creamy beans.

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Amazing BBQ, quick service and very friendly!  Try the share plate you won't regret it (Mac and cheese side dish, cheese is life) I we t here with my brother and the food and service is amazing, 5 out of 5 stars, this is real BBQ!

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: The food was absolutely delicious. I had the vegetarian version and loved it. My friend had meat and said it was one of the best he ever had.

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: My favorite restaurant in all of Amsterdam. It‚Äôs always great food and amazing service. All the sides are amazing, the smoked meat is amazing. Nothing not to love here. Specifically I love the cornbread, baked beans, and brisket.

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Great food! I particularly love their brisket and they meaty beans. The also make a wicked pecan pie. ‚Ä¶

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Really good impressive ! You have to taste it !

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Incredible food! Ribs are super impressive

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: A real-deal southern BBQ ‚Äî superb meat and sides. Brisket is to die for. Stop reading, just book yourself a table here.

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: I ordered from this restaurant to celebrate my birthday. I have to tell you that we were all enormously DISAPPOINTED! The Mac and cheese was just pasta with cheese, the beef ribs and brisket was super salty even to be able to eat it, and the portions are tiny! It‚Äôs overpriced and I would NEVER order from here again!

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: I cleaned my plate!  Excellent selection of authentic, smoky barbeque. We got the brisket and pork cheek - yum. My cocktail was terrific, and they have a solid collection of bourbon and rye. Finished it off with chocolate pecan pie served with bourbon whipped cream.  Highly recommend.

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: I liked the place, the side dishes are great, I liked the cocktails collection, the tall guy is super friendly and really helpful. The meat however was unfortunately too salty. We told them and they didn‚Äôt charge us for that dish. I do ‚Ä¶

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: We had to walk quite a bit of distance to get here since this place is a bit far from the city centre. However, it was totally worth it. The food was great. We tried to make a reservation (always do that for this place or call and check) ‚Ä¶

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Here I prefer ribs over brisket. Sides could be a little bit bigger. Nice quick service. Even though the beers choice is small the options are interesting.

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Amazing food , the brisket and the pulled pork  were amazing... I also liked the side dishes !! The beans and pulled pork also amazing!!

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Insanely good restaurant! Have been here multiple times and it's always absolutely delicious. Small menu, but everything is done to perfection. The brisket is out of this world! Have always been far too stuffed from the mains to try a ‚Ä¶

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Excellent. Recommend the brisket and the ribs. Loved the salad sides!

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Loved it. Loved it. Loved it! As an ex KCMO citizen it felt like coming home. Great food. Great service. No nonsense... and eh.. killer cocktails!

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Fantastic BBQ food and very nice service! We ordered the "Spread" to share between the two of us with beef brisket (finger lickin 'good!!), pork ribs and cheeks. Everything was delicious, including the sides, and the portions are generous. ‚Ä¶

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Amazingly good place for slow cooked braised meat.  Beef brisket is a must to have. On top of That, the side dishes are good as well. We ordered mac and cheese and cooked beans with meat and we were not disappointed at all. Try the tap beer ‚Ä¶

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: I've only ordered delivery (been meaning to visit the restaurant) but this is probably the best BBQ I've ever tasted. Better than anything I had in NYC or LA. Infact, better than the BBQ I had in Texas once too. It's delicious.

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Incredibly tasty food, served quickly. Cocktails also amazing.

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Great brisket, and delicious appetizers. Portions are a bit too big, if you ask me.. ü§≠

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: I'm an American and I've got the meat sweats. Amazing food and great service. Get the brisket!

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: I came here a couple of times and their American BBQ is one of the top ones in Amsterdam. This time around I ordered via deliveroo and I was doubtful of how fast and in what condition will I get it, based on my bad experiences with ‚Ä¶

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Speaking as an American expat living in Amsterdam: this place is legit. Mouth-watering brisket, great ribs. Better than many BBQ places I‚Äôve eaten at in the U.S. The chef is from Kansas City, which explains the authenticity. ‚Ä¶

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Holy moly. Perhaps the best pulled pork I‚Äôve ever eaten. There were crunchy little bits of pork like chicharrones that were PACKED with flavor. The cornbread was perfect too, but I love whole corn in my cornbread, so your mileage may vary. ‚Ä¶

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: We had a great meal here. The brisket was delicious and we also really enjoyed the mac and cheese side. All food was of high quality. The restaurant is intimate and cosy. Highly recommend this place for any meat lovers.

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: I've been multiple times and every time I've been blown away by how good the meat is. The brisket and the baby back ribs are by far the best I've had. The sides complement it perfectly and the lemon butter cake was so good I got a second slice. Favourite restaurant in Amsterdam.

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Great calf ribs, great BBQ, great cocktails; shame they Updike a bottle of wine that was 2x as expensive...

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Look, I usually don't have a great association with BBQ or anything related. But when we went to Pendergast for the birthday of a family member, I was pleasantly surprised. The brisket was my personal favourite. The food was very tender and ‚Ä¶

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Cocktails (while waiting) and takeaway were as perfect as ever. People were enjoying eat-in now restrictions are easing; I can't wait to spend an entire evening here.

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Amazing food and wine. If you enjoy meat then you should come here. Cooked to perfection. Hard to go wrong but shout out to the brisket and the ribs. Also the starters are great.

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Delicious full of flavour melt in the mouth meat. The sharer was plenty for 3 greedy eaters to share and the menu offered something for all tastes. The staff were helpful, friendly and attentive. Unfortunately there was a very rowdy large ‚Ä¶

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: I enjoyed the BBQ overall with the pork cheeks being the star of my plate. The black eyed peas were spot on. The ribs were so moist and juicy they were on the border of being too soft and the rub was fantastic. The mac and cheese was creamy ‚Ä¶

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Very good Kansas City style bbq. Meat is very tender and tasty. We had the brisket and the spare ribs. Good size portions of both. Sides were good too, and reasonably sized. We had the potato salad and meaty beans. Amazing amount of meat in ‚Ä¶

Name: Pendergast
Review Text:
Great Kansas Style BBQ in Amsterdam!
Nice food and nice people.

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: A delightful little restaurant!  A ride on the number 5 tram will take you right there, but don‚Äôt blink or you‚Äôll miss it. ‚Ä¶

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Superb brisket. Really good cocktails - best Old Fashioned I've had in years. And very friendly - managed to squeeze us in at the bar even though they were booked out. Beetroot with liquorice was great.

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: It was my first time eating there and the waitress explained to me the way the meat is smoked is like how they smoke meat in Kansas city. Having been in Kansas city myself and eaten there I had very high expectations. Once the meat ‚Ä¶

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: This place is simply amazing. An independent restaurant with warm friendly service. They actually make you feel that they are pleased you have come to eat there. And then there is the smoked food. The slow cooked beef brisket was amazing ‚Ä¶

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Virginian here. I've traveled and lived in Europe for about three years total: this is by far the best and most authentic barbecue place on the continent that I have discovered. ‚Ä¶

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Potato salad is amazing, for meat order the brisket! The pork cheek is a bit heavy on pepper but if you love pepper get it. Otherwise enjoy the juicy juicy brisket! :) and of course get the pecan pie, it‚Äôs all about the whipped cream :)

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Delicious, slow cooked meat specials. I still haven't had anything that I wouldn't recommend.

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: My intuition told me it would be tasty but I was not ready for the pleasant surprise. The girlfriend and I launched off from Canada and have been enjoying a Europe trip on our way through Paris, Amsterdam and Brussels. I normally wouldn't ‚Ä¶

Name: Pendergast
Review Text:
Truly the best brisket I can get on this side of the Mississippi.

Literally my only complaint is that they don‚Äôt offer fried okra, but as someone ‚Ä¶

Name: Pendergast
Review Text:
Had a lovely meal here on the recommendation of a colleague. I had the Brisket with mashed potatoes and my girlfriend had the pulled pork with Mac and Cheese.
The waitress was friendly and explained the menu to us with the note about ‚Ä¶

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Enjoyed an early Sunday dinner at Pendergast, starting with a cocktail. Friendly, enthusiastic waiter who explained & advised us on the menu. We selected the 'share' option - consisting of 3 main course picks & sides of your choice. You ‚Ä¶

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Excellent smoked BBQ brought to you by a wonderful cook/owner from Kansas City. The meat is super tender and tastes amazing. Don't expect regular food here (like grilled baby ribs), smoked BBQ is something completely different. I promise you, it will be a good experience!

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: A busy and crowded place. Squeezing in at the bar is not for the faint of heart. Reservations are required. The meats and fish are smoked on site each day. That means there is a limited supply of each. I had the beef brisket and, WOW! I'm ‚Ä¶

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Best barbecue in the country. I don't really eat meat much anymore, but gladly make an exception to visit this restaurant. Everything is excellent from the sides to the desserts to the 1950s styling of the place. One of the true gems in this city. Please don't ever change or disappear.

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Great food...as authentic American smoked meat as I‚Äôve found. Brisket, beef rib (the day‚Äôs special) pork cheek, beans...all awesome. Pricey but worth it. The beer was great, too. It‚Äôs a small place, but a good vibe and fun. The service was great too. I will be back!

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Delicious food, the brisket is just amazing!

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: The brisket and the pork cheek were just delicious, you can see (taste!) all the work and care that goes into it. Sides are also perfect, very good beer, looking forward to the next visit!

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Absolutely deliciously slow cooked BBQ fare. Three of us shared ribs, brisket and pork neck alongside mac & cheese, potato salad and meaty BBQ beans. The meats were all wonderfully cooked, pulled apart nicely without too much chew and had a ‚Ä¶

Name: Pendergast
Review Text:
After reading all the rave reviews we decided to give this place a shot.
We tried the brisket and honestly were a bit disappointed/ underwhelmed. It was ok but unfortunately not more. ‚Ä¶

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: You need to understand that this place makes some of the best bbq I have ever had. Coming from someone who is from Kansas (land of famous KC style bbq), this is a big deal. The smoked brisket, pork cheeks, and turkey are all impeccable. If ‚Ä¶

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: This is my second time here, this is the best smokehouse in Amsterdam! Great service too!

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Ribs had only fat on them, vegetarian Seitan tasted awful and was inedible. Ended up throwing the meal away.

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Quite possibly the best barbecue I have ever had. The brisket was heavenly. It fell apart at the touch of your fork and the layer of fat on the edge of each piece melted in your mouth like pepper flavored honey. Out of this world...

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Great barbecue (of course with a very small menu for the small space) that really makes me feel like I'm back in the States.  Definitely do a reservation ahead of time.  I was really pleased with the smoked brisket. If only they'd do beef ribs...

Name: Pendergast
Review Text:
Meat-lovers delight
If the thought of slow-cooked, Southern-style comfort food makes your mouth water, then reserve a table here, quick! While the interior is nothing to write home ‚Ä¶

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Not sure where all these good ratings come from but my experience is that this place is a rip-off. 30‚Ç¨ for ribs that were nothing but fat, the smallest amount of meat I have ever seen on ribs for twice the price.

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Seriously great - I'm an American, came here on July 4th looking for some authentic bbq.  Really great food, cocktails, owner is a great guy from KC that knows his stuff

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Judging by the dress code of the host, I would have expected to only get served potatoes, slaw and pasta ... Then, quickly, the contrast became stark as the quality of the bark gave the corner of my eye a little spark. Brisket to set a ‚Ä¶

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: The most delicious bbq that I have ever tasted (until now). The bbq sauce was also addictive. I'd recommend to order the mixed dish with a bit of everything to taste as much as possible.

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Hard to come by a brisket place in Europe and surprisingly they do it excellent. Other meat we ordered were all great but brisket is the highlight. Very friendly staff is the bonus. Definetely recommend it..

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: I am from Kansas City but have lived in Amsterdam for over three years now...and I can tell you that Pendergast is the Most Authentic BBQ restaurant in The Netherlands.  A little taste of home, down to each last drop of their delicious BBQ sauce.  Thanks guys!

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Great food and service, and I liked the cocktails too!

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Fantastic authentic Kansas slow smoked to perfection meat combined with perfect home made side dishes! Try the spread: oh so good. And the service is great and friendly!

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: A restaurant that understands what matters! Very tasty food. great drinks and very friendly, authentic people. Best BBQ I ever had! Must do for everyone who likes meat.

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: A bbq joint that focuses on food, not on being hip. Raises the bar for smoked meats to a whole new level (in the Netherlands). Small but considered beer collection and some really nice wines. Friendly chef from the heartland of US barbecue is always in for a chat. Small place and cozy little tables, tastefully decorated.

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: The closest I have come to Austin/Texan style bbq outside of the region (I hear the owners represent Kansas city style so i hope I'm not starting a war). And a limited but informed collection of whiskey! This place will be trouble for my wallet.

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Pendergast is truly a gem in the west of Amsterdam. There are few restaurants in the Netherlands that do American cuisine well. Pendergast knocks Kansas City BBQ out of the park while still offering spectacular options for vegetarians. The meats are of high quality and the smoked seitan may be the best I've ever had.

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: After so many positive reviews we with my wife were really disappointed with this place and this food. First of all, place itself was not cozy (cheap not comfortable tables and chairs). The guy that served us was very friendly and ready to ‚Ä¶

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Ridiculously good food. The salmon was by far the best I've ever had and it wasn't even the best thing on the table, the brisket and the pulled pork where sublime, the pickled beets where delicious. I was moaning the whole time. I can't stop thinking about it, I might be in love.

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Pretty decent food. Spareribs were good but really black on the outside. The two person portions were a bit smaller than we expected. Service is good too. Didn‚Äôt speak Dutch though.

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Fabulous!! The closest to down-home-Southern cooking that you're going to find outside of the deep South in the US. Some of the best ribs and brisket I've ever eaten. The service was excellent and very friendly, too!

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: The best barbecue food I‚Äôve had in the Netherlands. The ribs are insane and the meaty beans are next level.

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Not cheapest or biggest portions but authentic smoked bbq in a cozy environment. Probably the best American style ribs I‚Äôve had in NL. Nice neighborhood restaurant

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: A cosy restaurant with good vibes, delectable foods and fine wine. We enjoyed the best smoked brisket and ribs with an array of delicious side dishes and pickled carrots. A must if you are visiting Amsterdam

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Amazed how a cozy dinner spot in Amsterdam made me feel like I was back in the states eating with my family after a great bbq... Seriously, this place is it! Delicious meats, sides to die for and smiles from the staff makes it one of the best places in town!

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: I've been twice now and waited to review until I knew it wasn't just a fluke the food was awesome in the first time I went.  This place is great. It's hard to get a table unless you go early. But it's worth the effort for sure.

Name: Pendergast
Review Text:
Meat was great!
Only thing which stopped this place getting 5 stars was because the food is prepared very early (most things are slow cooked, and started long before you get ‚Ä¶

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Delicious food made with passion. Staff is very friendly and helpfull. Eighter if you're a carnivore, vegetarian or vegan you'll find some nice items on the menu. I really enjoyed the seitan, kale and black eyed peas. They also do cocktails and high end whiskeys!

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Great food, wish I had ordered the platter of three dishes. Had the ribs and tasted some of the brisket. Real bbq flavors,  and meat comes right of the bone.

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: This place is not for the lighthearted... everything they cook is slow cooked and it has an overwhelming bbq/smoke taste. I am looking forward to having an excuse to eat here again as soon as possible. Great service and good price for the great quality you get.

Name: Pendergast
Review Text:
Delicious, wonderful, great staff, super food, saved my thanksgiving!
‚ù§Ô∏è

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Food was excellent only reason for my 3 stars. Never go if you have a date or romantic evening after dinner we where asked to go because of other reservations could no even try their delicous desserts really dissapointed with Pendergast never again!

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Amazing food!!! The slow cooked meat is a dream the meat melted in our mouths. Also the staff was amazing, very nice and helpful. It was an amazing experience!!!!

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Nice location, cute little place. starters are underwhelming. Main dishes are beautiful and rich, deserts are much too sweet. Great cocktails. I leave with mixed feelings.

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: My favorite restaurant in Amsterdam. There is no one who does smoking and slow cooking as this guy does. He is skilled and extremely passionate about what he does, and judging from the food, he knows what he is doing! He would happily show you around the kitchen and let you meet the big smoker.

Name: Pendergast
Review Text:
Do you want awesome smoked meat? Cause these guys have awesome smoked meat.
It's delicious and the service is really nice. Amazing little restaurant!

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Excellent food quality serving great comfort foods, clean restaurant and expansive drinks menu. The ribs were superb and the salmon was cooked perfectly. Highly recommended!

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Simply put, this is an amazing BBQ joint that rivals most places I've been in the US and Canada. A little expensive if you compare to the US but still believe the price is worth it.

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Good food and friendly host...ordered the spread(brisket, pulled pork and salmon) and it was really good...soft and tender meat with crisyp burnt outside...definetly worth a visit again

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: The food is so good you will hurt yourself trying to finish it. I have been twice in week already. Good turkey in Amsterdam is hard to find. It's a meat lovers paradise

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Wow! The bbq sauce here is to die for. The meat (we had brisket, pulled pork and ribs) was incredibly tender and the sides (meaty bbq beans, mac & cheese and garlic mash) were great too!

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Good food, nice atmosphere, very friendly owner. Be aware that this is not a steak house, but slow cooked smoked meat is just perfect!

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Amazing BBQ, especially the ribs. Also offers a decent vegetarian main, good sides and interesting cocktails. Reservations are a must at peak days/times.

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: I'd give this place six stars if I could. The meats are smoked impeccably, the cocktails are varied and delicious and each of the sides I've tried (been twice) were outta this world. They even have PECAN Pie!

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Very good food, service, and drinks

Name: Pendergast

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Incredible brisket, amazing salmon. The service is good and the food comes out quick. ‚Ä¶

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Bang average. Bland meats and flavourless sides. Amsterdam must be on its arse if this gets 4.5 stars. ‚Ä¶

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Prepare for your socks to be totally knocked off by the big flavours, succulent meat, quality beer and sexy cocktails. Go to Pendergast and eat your fill. Just don't expect to have any breakfast or lunch the following day!

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: Best grill restaurant in Amsterdam, with slow smoked meats that will make your mouth water. Not cheap and setting is clinical at best, but that Kansas city brisket is to die for

(Original) ‚Ä¶

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Unique place and certainly not just a bbq tent. Meat prepared with great care. The side dishes are also very tasty. To be repeated. ‚Ä¶

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: (Translated by Google) As always the food was again very tasty, served quickly because everything had been cooking for a long time. Portions are perfect. ‚Ä¶

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Excellent tex-mex cooking restaurant, meat to its point, perhaps too burned to the outside but to the point inside, do not miss the accompaniments. ‚Ä¶

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Best brisket we have encountered in the Netherlands so far. ‚Ä¶

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Very personable and friendly staff. The entire menu revolves around smoked dishes, very tasty! Ask for what is not on the menu. ‚Ä¶

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Super tasty and very friendly staff! We'll be back for sure. ‚Ä¶

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Very nice place, we have been here twice and both times the food was delicious and the service incredibly friendly. Recommended! ‚Ä¶

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: (Translated by Google) I still sniff the over-delicious meat flavors from my girlfriend's sweater after the tastiest piece of meat I've eaten this year. ‚Ä¶

Name: Pendergast
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Great BBQ say. Take the "share" where you get 3 types of meat. And nice enthusiastic service. Recommended! ‚Ä¶

Name: Pendergast
